name: Burning Cauldron
description:
You are an alchemist in a small village.
Thus you are in charge for running all kinds of potion and cooking deeds.

Get your ingredients ready, fire up the cauldron and get ready to brew the hell out of it!

This game was part of the Optical Jam #4, so it might not be the best user experience.I will however take your feedback and will continue working on the game for a while until i am satisfied with the result.

The theme of the jam was the following image, which we interpreted as a burning cauldron. So we came up with this idea.
